description: A GitHub Action to generate TypeScript comments.

scripts.upgrade: npx -y npm-check-updates -u && npm install && npm run fix
scripts.mock-TypeScript: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action ../TypeScript/src/**/*.ts --vars dryRun=true mock=true maxEdits=10000
scripts.mini-TypeScript: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action ../TypeScript/src/**/*.ts --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2
scripts.mock-typescript-write-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/typescript-without-docs.ts --vars dryRun=true mock=true
scripts.mini-typescript-write-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/typescript-without-docs.ts --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2
scripts.mock-typescript-revise-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/typescript-with-docs.ts --vars dryRun=true mock=true updateExisting=true
scripts.mini-typescript-revise-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/typescript-with-docs.ts --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2 updateExisting=true
scripts.mock-python-write-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/python-without-docs.py --vars dryRun=true mock=true
scripts.mini-python-write-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/python-without-docs.py --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2
scripts.mock-python-revise-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/python-with-docs.py --vars dryRun=true mock=true updateExisting=true
scripts.mini-python-revise-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/python-with-docs.py --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2 updateExisting=true
scripts.mock-csharp-write-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/csharp-without-docs.cs --vars dryRun=true mock=true
scripts.mini-csharp-write-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/csharp-without-docs.cs --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2
scripts.mock-csharp-revise-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/csharp-with-docs.cs --vars dryRun=true mock=true updateExisting=true
scripts.mini-csharp-revise-docs: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action test/csharp-with-docs.cs --vars dryRun=true maxEdits=2 updateExisting=true
scripts.mock: DEBUG=script* genaiscript run action --vars dryRun=true updateExisting=true mock=true
